title: Apple's stock gain would add over 20 points to the Dow
text: Apple Inc.'s stock AAPL, +0.85% surged 1.5% in premarket trading Friday, and was the biggest gainer among Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.47% components ahead of the open, after a Nikkei report that the technology giant has asked supplies to boost iPhone production by 10%. The stock's implied price gain would add about 23 points to the Dow's price, while Dow futures YMZ19, -0.30% slumped 65 points. The stock's gain would be enough to lift Apple's market capitalization back above the trillion-dollar threshold, after a three-day stretch below that level. Apple shares have rallied 8.0% over the past three months through Thursday, while the Nasdaq Composite COMP, +1.12% has declined 3.7% and the Dow has slipped 2.8%.
